:::{#thm-d_pi_d_beta}

Using @cor-d_odds_d_beta and @cor-d_prob-d_odds:

$$
\ba
\purple{\derivf{\pi}{\vb}}
&= \red{\derivf{\odds}{\vb}} \blue{\derivf{\prob}{\odds}}
\\
&= \paren{\red{\vx\frac{\prob}{1-\prob}}} \blue{(1-\prob)^2}
\\
&= \purple{\vx \prob (1-\prob)}
\ea
$$

:::
